name: DD Mr Gun
description:
You wanna kill somebody… Stop! Play this new shooter game “Mr Gun” and kill ANYBODY!!

 Mr Gun is an addictive arcade casual shooter game that lets you drain your energy!

In this game, you can buy many guns and styles by collecting more coins and passing levels.

Every level of this game has a boss that you have to kill him to finish the level. By entering the next level you will see new people and a new boss to kill!

If you shoot the head of people, you’ll hear the sound of HEADSHOT!!

All the assets of Mr Gun are designed with DoonDookStudio including graphic design and music.

Our Game Store for Game Source Codes: https://doondook.studio/buy-html5-games
